pageProduct.name: Sukin Brightening Radiance Gel Cleanser Pump 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

With Australian Bioactive Complex To Cleanse Away Impurities For A More Luminous Complexion.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Our Glow-Promoting Cleanser Gently Exfoliates To Remove Dead Skin Cells, Excess Sebum & Make-Up. With Antioxidant Rich Blend Of Kakadu Plum, Pineapple, Mango & Papaya Extract To Hydrate Your Skin And Help Prevent Damage Caused By Environmental Stressors.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Bromelain, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract (Kakadu Plum), Squalane, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Glucose, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Polyquaternium-10, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Limonene** *Natural Fragrance **Component Of Natural Fragrance

Directions

Apply A Small Amount With Moist Hands And Lather With Water. Gently Massage Into Skin, Then Rinse Thoroughly With Water. Use Morning And Night.
